OpenGL
======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which OpenGL installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using OpenGL, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load OpenGL/2025.09-GCCcore-14.3.0
```
